document_data.caption: A map showing the Liontongue River in the Shining Lands.
document_data.name: Liontongue River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Liontongue River''', also known as the '''River Pritan''' or the '''River Panka''', was a waterway found in the [[Shining Lands]].'''<nowiki/>'''
document_data.Geography: The river flowed through [[Veldorn]], [[Estagund]] and a small part of [[Durpar]]. It originated in the [[Thrulaliel Mountains]] in the southwest, flowing north to join the [[River Madras]] near the [[Wood of Dark Trees]] before turning east and meeting the western bank of the [[Golden Water]]. The Liontongue River stretched for several hundred miles along its path to the sea.
